author: jstrachan
msg: Added more unit test cases for <forEach> and for whitespace handling and to help fix the text trimming bugs

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched bug where trimming the end of whitespace would leave a trailing whitespace character

author: jstrachan
msg: patched bug that <j:forEach var="i" begin="1" end="10"> wasn't running 10 times like the JSTL spec says it should. Basically the last i="10" loop wasn't running

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch which tidies up the processing of whitespace trimming a bit. I think this could fix the whitespace bug but needs more testing.

author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch so that the <soap:invoke> tag can take the parameters as an attribute...
Also added another example that converts MM to inches using a web service; using Floats.
